thread.section_title: Travelup Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.travelup.co.uk | 43 of 1272
thread.title: Colin Smith

author: Colin Smith
title: Colin Smith
text:
Did not allow me to choose extra leg-room. I am a big man and will suffer terribly on a long flight London U.K. To Calgary. Last time l did this in a 767 l almost had a break down. My knees were jammed up against the back if the seat in front for 8 hours. I am 230 lbs and over 6 feet. Your web page shut down on me before l could make the sear selection.
Colin Smith please offer it earlier next time.
